Package resources

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderable
    Interface for meshes and splines.
    Resource
    Basic methods for resources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Fbo
    Object oriented wrapper class above the native FBO.
    LoadableResourceMetaData
    Stores meta data for loadable resources like it's path or it's size.
    ResourceManager
    Manages the loaded models, textures and splines.
    Ubo
    Object oriented wrapper class above the native Uniform Buffer Objec.t
    Vao
    Object oriented wrapper class above the native Vertex Array Object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot
    Attachment slot.
    Fbo.FboAttachmentType
    Attachment's type.
    Fbo.FboCompleteness
    FBO's completeness.
    ResourceManager.ResourceState
    Resource's state.
